Read our Technology walkthroughs on Medium→

Interface free insights.

Off-the-shelf large language models use information from around the internet. Our software that converts maritime technical documentation into a database similar to ChatGPT. User queries are then drawn from the technical database when formulating responses. The platform is a push into interface-free interactions that will provide support to marine operators.

Reduce Hallucinations

As of June 20204, the platform contains over 15.4 million words of maritime text corpora. By comparison, ChatGPT 4.0 contains under a trillion words. By removing general text corpora and replacing it with maritime subject matter, the chat is better able to handle technical queries.

Access real-time data

Near real time AIS data, Bunker prices, Weather data, and the latest vessel routing

Latest Technology

Preferred AI technologes are changing rapidly. Shipping Intel is researching the latest off the shelf technologies and tailoring them to meet your specific needs.

Grounded truth in AI Solutions.

Grounded truth in the maritime domain reduces operational risk.
